basics.label: Front Desk Attendant
basics.summary: Graduated Bridgewater State University in May 2015 with a Bachelor's degree in Aviation Management and recently started the MBA Aviation program at Embry-riddle Aeronautical University at the Worldwide campus with a concentration on International Business.

work.summary: FBO business. Direct service to private airplanes. Marshaling, fueling and towing of aircraft.
Aircraft transit coordinator. Dispatchment of company aircraft. Cargo Operations
Kept records of room availability and guests' accounts. Assisted guests with any special requests. Performed bookkeeping activities such as balancing accounts and conducting nightly audits.

courses: Aviation Management concentration with in-depth knowledge of standard airline operations.
Aviation International Business study and strategic planning for international operations of aviation related business' added to core business courses.
